body:
This PR adds the following variants for building netcdf-cxx4:
- PIC
- DAP
- JNA
- Doxygen documentation
- ncgen4
- pnetcdf
- netcdf4
- shared libraries
- static libraries
All variants have explicit toggles for enable/disable and I did my best to preserve existing behaviors with the default values.
title: netcdf-cxx4: Add new variants
